document.full_text: the man who panted as he shot an alabama tornado video that went viral on the internet said he was not breathing heavily out of fear but had just sprinted up some stairs.
document.title: panting alabama tornado videographer was winded, not afraid
lines_and_colors: the man who panted as he shot an alabama tornado video that went viral on the internet said he was not breathing heavily out of fear but had just sprinted up some stairs.
